thread.section_title: Costa Rican Vacations Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Costa Rican Vacations | www.vacationscostarica.com
thread.title: George K.
thread.title_full: Costa Rican Vacations reviewed by George K.

author: George K.
title: George K.
text: All the facilities were great! Very clean and the hospitality was great. I have learned to really like rice and beans and something else for meals. The people of Costa Rica were wonderful. The Drivers, especially Alex, were great at making our long drives a wonderful experience. The country is beautiful and I brought home the sound of waves gently crashing on the shoreline. Everything Shay, my travel consultant from CRV, said it would be lived up to that claim. Thanks for a wonderful experience and memory.
